title: People are now refusing to vaccinate their dogs.
author: Omega
description: Hose them down first. Not because they're unwashed peasants (although, of course, they are), but because the water cannon is an important part of the French mating ritual.
cleaned_text: Life What if they're French? Hose them down first. Not because they're unwashed peasants (although, of course, they are), but because the water cannon is an important part of the French mating ritual.
